title: Varus buff idea?
body:
Just an idea:
I was thinking, as I used to play a lot of varus until recently, that a lot of his weaknesses could be solved with one issue. Mobility. Now, I know that people say he is not a mobility champion, however, I think this buff idea could make him quite fun to play, as well as reward people with aggressive and bullying behavior in lane and maybe pull him back in the meta. 
Simply put, I ask of riot to do this: When your w procs on an enemy champion, you have a, say, 5 second time limit to use a dash roughly the size of a lucian or vayne even dash. 
This would make varus mobile enough to keep with the current meta, and to let him get time to reposition after a aggressive play in lane. It would also give him some mobility in team-fights if he is caught out when his ult, which would help his supposed strength in that area, and would compensate for his falling off late game.
I also personally think that it would make him more enjoyable to snipe with and to improve his playability in the current meta. 
About it being broken, I don't think it would be if, either, as you can give a set timer after being used and unless you use it, not proc it's cool-down, and because you need to proc the w, it would not be an OP buff  imo, it would just give him a situational burst of mobility.
I would also like some sort of way to diminish the cool-down by simply getting the w procced.
To conclude, I think that this would be a decent buff which could bring another bursty adc back into the meta!
(P.S comment your opinions too)

Mobility boots only help when you're OUT of combat, not when you're getting chased down. Swifty boots are ok, but when you have like three of the enemy team chasing you down and they have movement buffs *hmm Volibear* or they each have SUPER CRAZY STUNS *HMMM MORGANA* I'm pretty sure that there's nothing that you can do with Varus. Adding a mobility buff will make him easier and more fun to play, so I don't know why you're getting so pumped up about an idea lol. In the end we all like Varus

I think Varus is fine as he is right now, he's not meant to be mobile, the relatively (believe it or not) low ult cooldown is meant to offset the fact that he doesn't have mobility/utility like Vayne or Lucian. 
I think his ult is his main disengage and lock down ability coupled with his slows; they are actually quite strong. You're meant to watch your positioning anyway as a fragile ADC. Most Varuses have {{item:3026}} for survivability. 
In that context, he probably isn't the best ADC around and because he can be caught easier than Lucian and Vayne who follow the mobility meta of Season 3.

Varus isn't someone like Lucian. He's not meant to be really mobile.
Varus isn't someone like Vayne, a hyper mobile low range carry.

Varus is meant to be an immobile powerhouse of raw mixed damage who can peel for himself, but then again it's not unlimited peeling so he's not broken.

He's fine as he is, and perfectly enjoyable and viable to play for those who like and do fine with him.
